oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Promoting organic growth through model farms – use of the Leader Approach in Ukraine
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Eisenring, Tobias
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Markets and trade
Produce chain management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Interesting growth potential starts developing through the presence of few actors that spearhead most commercial activities in a sector. Such actors are very innovative but do not necessarily have all the necessary know-how. The Leader approach has a strong business development focus with the objective to strengthen such pioneers and spread the experience among small- and medium enterprises in order to enter the sector and contribute to growth.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Eisenring, Tobias (2014) Promoting organic growth through model farms – use of the Leader Approach in Ukraine. Paper at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
